column2: We are now at the mercy of Prussia.

column2: Further Political Integration In Northern Germany

Prussia is destined to dominate and unify Germany. Our influence over the principalites and duchies of northern Germany have entrenched itself to such a degree that we may force political integration," if we disregard the international outrage...                             Note: Will integrate a random North German Sphereling that has been Sphered for 10 years costs 5 infamy and have a 1 year cooldown. ßGDO NOT use this decision unless you have had a North German spherling for at least 10 years
Prussia is influencing our country, one day they might demand political integration.
We are applying pressure to the north german duchies and principalites to further their political integration with Prussia.
Two years of rpoints will be given.
